page.title: 04BO'NESS SHIPBREAKER'S YARD
page.content: The only shipbreakers yard in Bo'ness is owned by Stephen Dalton and is in the district of Grangepans. It is closing down in 1985 after operating for over 80 years. It has, during this time, had lots of types of ships to break up but we know that the last ship to be broken up was a ship that laid pipes for oil. There is new management taking over the building though. These new owners are called Thomson and Balfour. When the cranes are removed and the ground cleared it will be used as a wood yard.
